version_description:
Yay! PunBall is getting ready to meet you all!

The first version will have the following content:

Gameplay
-100 Chapters
-Talent System
-Equipment System
-Shop System
-Quests

Event
-Launch Carnival
-Activity Quests
-Piggy Bank
-Growth Fund
-Item Investment

Plenty of free rewards await you! Login now and claim them! Lots of surprises await you too! So enter now and explore!
